room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Richmond in Richmond (VA)
review: Casey was so helpful and kind while we did casino for my boyfriends birthday. Although we only did want one clue it was so challenging we loved it even though we lost. 10/10 would come up from Virginia Beach to come here again for a new room.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Richmond in Richmond (VA)
review: Went last night with some of my friends- we did the casino room. It was a blast! Love escape rooms and will definitely be back to this one

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Richmond in Richmond (VA)
review: Had a great time with my son and 7 of his friends yesterday for his birthday. The kids did operation casino. A lot of interactive and imaginative puzzles for them to decipher. Our game master Lauren was very awesome and patient with our group! Definitely will go back!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Richmond in Richmond (VA)
review: Absolutely loved this game. It was challenging - half of our party were experienced Escape Room players, and we finished with literally seconds to spare!

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Richmond in Richmond (VA)
review: Great staff and challenging but wonderful game. Definitely will be returning.
